description: Ensure that your ESXi hosts are upgraded to version 8 to prevent operational penalties when starting virtual machines. Following this upgrade, no issues related to the installation of the October 2023 cumulative update should be observed. The link provided in the post contains relevant information for both Hyper-V and VMware environments, detailing potential problems and their resolutions. It is critical to stay up to date with the latest versions to maintain optimal performance and compatibility. Be sure to check the recommended version regularly to avoid any disruptions in service.
